channel.title: Dumbass gets carjacked while ghost riding
channel.description:
Somewhat old but I just came across it.
The wigger is trying to ghost ride (at 2 mph may I mind you) and gets his car jacked.
Looks real to me, vid link [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KhuJk5oG0JM&mode=related&search=]here[/url].

item.title: Dumbass gets carjacked while ghost riding
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Someone posted proof this was staged(faked), but I can’t for the life of me find it.

Read full topic
item.source: Dumbass gets carjacked while ghost riding

item.title: Dumbass gets carjacked while ghost riding
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

Buzzy:

Mastrchief, I always like the way that you stick up for everything that you believe in. But sorry, I’ve gotta oppose you on this one. The fact that the black guy just “happened” to be there on the day that the wigger was shooting the video, in what looks like the type of neighborhood that cars don’t usually get stolen. It’s still funny, which is the reason the video was uploaded. Take it for what it is. Let’s not dissect everything for realness because of our craving for truth, let’s take it for what it’s meant to be and judge it from there.

If I’m wrong, I’ll accept it.

We have no prove on whether it is real or fake at this point.

Looks can be deceiving, even rich neighborhoods have crimes.

Read full topic

item.title: Dumbass gets carjacked while ghost riding
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

[quote=“akisboy32, post:1, topic:127501”][quote author=MastrChief link=topic=178002.msg1631341#msg1631341 date=1185559200]

Added: January 23, 2007[/quote]

He probably got the car back and later uploaded it, then it got re-distributed around the internet like everything else.

ow cmon , do you really think it got stolen not to upload the video on youtube?
common sense…[/quote]

Just like a good portion of all internet users, you can’t seem to except anything as real unless you’ve actually had an experience with it.

Get over yourself. I stated my opinion about it being real, but you’re trying to make it a fact its not when you aren’t even sure. You’re just assuming, based on who knows what.

exe626:

Anything could happen you know, that was 4 days ago.

5 Months lol.

Read full topic
